name: superfluid-subgraph
description: Subgraph for the Superfluid Ethereum contracts

scripts.deploy-mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs rtoken-project/rdai
scripts.deploy-kovan: mustache config/kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs rtoken-project/rdai-kovan
scripts.deploy-local: yarn prepare:local && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 rtoken-test
